title: Didnt got Doomed Minion Icon
body: I thought i had to be patient but i never got it, i did played the game and killed the 500 i think minions and i was logged in my account so i dont know why i never got it :(

replies.body: No worries, we can help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see what happened and help out.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

Same here =/
I remember reading another post that November 17th was supposed to be the day they were going to push out the last wave of icons to people.

I played the little minigame where you had to sacrifice 500 minions and completed it, got the prompt that told me I was awarded the icon but still never got it.

For the record, I did play it right before the deadline. Sometime on Nov. 3rd (The last day of the event) but it still told me I received the icon though so I should have it but unfortunately it's not showing up in my icon inventory.
